doc.title: No comment - minimundus AUSTRIA
doc.plot: Using private material from the years 1953-56, Gustav Deutsch makes 'No comment - minimundus AUSTRIA' the scene of a memorable collision between two systems of news reporting and identity mediation. From a distance of over forty years, two paradigms, two stylistic blooms, race towards one another. The good old black-and-white newsreel meets side tracks of cable Euro-News. (Claus Philipp)
